Summary Note:
The RM first met Durand Moreau Bertrand at a wine tasting event in Paris. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Durand Moreau Bertrand is a seasoned professional with over 41 years of experience.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Durand Moreau Bertrand and Laurène tied the knot in 1996. Durand and Laurène have 1 child, named Richard.
Education Background:
Durand obtained his secondary school diploma from Lycée Pierre Corneille in 1979.
Durand pursued higher education at EMIC de Nice, graduating in 1983.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 41 years, Durand Moreau Bertrand has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Durand Moreau Bertrand launched his career as a Junior Trader at Total S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 1984 to 1988.
In 1989, he moved to ArcelorMittal S.A. to work as a Senior Trader, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 550000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns 3 exceptional properties: flat located in Strasbourg, valued at approximately 1,310,000.00 EUR, townhouse located in Dijon, valued at approximately 1,368,000.00 EUR, townhouse located in Rennes, valued at approximately 1,780,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases his flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Strasbourg, Dijon and Rennes.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In summary, Durand has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
